name: Cutie Tutti Frutti (isoteriksoftware)
description:
Cutie Tutti Frutti is an Arcade Breakout game. In this game, you're to clear the fruits above the screen while trying to prevent the ball from exploding using a manually controlled paddle. 

The game uses the classical Breakout games styles but with twists and changes that makes it different from the usual Breakout games you know.

The game uses real-time physics simulation to create immensive collisions and bouncing!

The game also have items that can be used as powerups to help finish the level quicker and to earn more points!

The game features a shop where you can exchange points for new items that can be used during game play.

The game also has in-built tutorial sections to help you get started quickly and can be accessed anytime you need a fresher!

The game is absolutely free! And NO ADS!
